title: SHUTTER_ISLAND.(2010).(M.Scorsese).H263.800p[)(]Dts-DD+ 5.1-(En,
description:
Good evening there

Here is our remastered bdrip concerning "Shutter Island" directed by Martin Scorsese with Leonardo DiCaprio and more...

This is an excellent movie to discover or to discovering as Mystery/Thriller for sure.

See imdb right here : <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1130884/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1130884/</a>

codec used : mkv h.263

screen resolution : 800p as cropped to 1440 x 460 from 1440 x 810 with full screen ability anyway.

Spoken language : English and French only.

Subtitle : English,French,Dutch,Danish,Finnish,Norwegian,Swedish.

removed/downmixed HD MA part of original DTS for simple core DTS 5.1/48 KHz/24 bit/1509 kpps for English language

upmixed ac3 5.1/640 kbps to DD+ aka E-ac3 5.1/48 KHz/32 bit/768 kbps for French language.
